name: Snake's Loop
description:
This game is made for black and white game jam. A little story about a snake who needs to find an oasis, but something goes wrong. All assets, including music, are ours.

If you can't download the game, you can download from the cloud.
https://drive.google.com/file/d/1wukxeqgDflbaJYO1BVEuVveJjB5--YQ1/view?usp=shari...
or
https://disk.yandex.ru/d/1PLLhROwQdh4DA

Сделали Егор Зупник и Владимир Петровский
